original_text: When they arrived, he said to them: “You know how I lived the whole time I was with you, from the first day I came into the province of Asia.
korean_text: 오매 그들에게 말하되 아시아에 들어온 첫날부터 지금까지 내가 항상 여러분 가운데서 어떻게 행하였는지를 여러분도 아는 바니

sentences.original_text: the whole time I was with you
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너희와 함께 있던 모든 시간 동안

sentences.original_text: I came into the province of Asia
